article_text:
Beverly, MA (01915)

Today

Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 59F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%..

Tonight

A shower is possible early. Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

article_metadata.author: BY ETHAN FORMANSTAFF WRITER

og.description: SALEM — After closely examining for the past three years how patients are managed, a more than $200 million investment in Salem and Lynn’s Union hospitals and in local community
og.title: Salem Hospital to expand
